review: If you are looking for a neat and clean rooms and basic needs this is the place to be. The staff is very courteous and the service they is very warm and good. The price they charge very economical. Overall a very good plave to stay.
name: Alok S

review: The amenities at this hotel are so so but the for the price and location it is good. Very conveniently located to all the amenities like bus stand, railway station, market gives it a distinct advantage. A value for money proposition
name: Sureka S

review: I frequenly travel to Rudrapur for qork and one such trip took me to this place. The place is decent to stay with average pricing and good staff and cordial service. The food is also good. Overall a decent place to stay.
name: Alok S

review: This is a decent budget hotel and good for short business stays that i usually go for.The location is good, the rooms are well laid out and clean and the food on service is also good. Overall it is very comfortable place to stay in.
name: Alok S

review: If you are looking at a very low price / budget pricing but do not want to compromise on location then this is the place to be. Located in the main market it offers a average value for money in terms room size, cleanliness and service.  Pricing and location though are excellent.
name: Alok S
